moves.1. e4: This is a friendly with me being white and  against a friend of mine.
moves.17... f3 18. gxf6: gxf6. Queen Sacrifice opens the file for the rooks. I took about 6 or 7 minutes on that move.
moves.19. Rxg7+ Kh8 20. Rxh7+ Kg8 21. Rg1+:
Black resigns.
His only move was bishop g4 which then will be checkmate.
